title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 372.10 - Non-assignability of benefits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 372.10 - Non-assignability of benefits

State Regulations

The benefits payable under the plan may not be assigned or
alienated by a participant, except as otherwise permitted for benefits payable
by the system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
372.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
